item.title: GNU/Linux CLI Shells ELI5: sh, bash, zsh and more
item.description: If you’ve ever interacted with a GNU/Linux system, chances are you’ve heard about shells like sh, bash and zsh. But what are these shells, why are they so important? What even is a shell? And “most importantly” why should you even care about them? In this article, we’ll take a closer look at GNU/Linux shells and try to explain them in an ELI5-fashioned way. We’ll discuss some essential terms like: terminal, shell and CLI.
